musicRepresentation

Class ABCMusic

  • java.lang.Object
    • musicRepresentation.ABCMusic

  • public class ABCMusic
extends java.lang.Object
    This class consists of a representation of an .abc file, in a way that is possible to extract information to be played with some kind of sequencer. For now it gives information to be converted to MIDI. It gather information from an .abc file by parsing it. It is an immutable class.
    Author:
    Nicholas M. Mizoguchi

    • Constructor Summary

      ABCMusic(java.lang.String path)
      Creates a representation of an ABC file as an ABCMusic Object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ABCMusic

        public ABCMusic(java.lang.String path)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a representation of an ABC file as an ABCMusic Object.
        Parameters:
        path - the .abc file to be interpreted.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case the path or the file is invalid.

    • Method Detail

      • constructSequencerInformation

        public java.util.List<SequencerInformation> constructSequencerInformation()
        Transform the representation of the .abc file into information to be passed to a SequencePlayer. It goes through all voices, returning the representation of each note as a MidiNoteRepresentation in the list.
        Returns:
        an instance of SequencerInformation

      • getTitle

        public java.lang.String getTitle()
        Gives the Title of the piece of music ABCHeader represents
        Returns:
        the title String itself.
